Moreover, let us examine the concept of infinity. Infinity represents an endless cycle or repetition. When we add two entities together (2+2), we are essentially creating a cycle where the entities repeat themselves. In this context, the result of 2+2 equaling 1 signifies the repetition of two entities, resulting in a single cycle or unity.
